title: Drawing, "The High Priest Punishes a Vestal Virgin, Sala di Numa Pompilius, Palazzo Milzetti, Faenza", 1802–05
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash over black chalk on white laid paper
inscribed: Inscribed in pen and brown ink, upper center: bottom segment of a cut-off number; on temple frieze: VESTA; lower center: Il sommo sacerdote castiga una/ vestaleche a pecato
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: High Priest raises stick over kneeling Vestal at right; at left, his staff leans against chair upon which lies paper roll. Statue of Vesta stands in rear.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "The High Priest Punishes a Vestal Virgin, Sala di Numa Pompilius, Palazzo Milzetti, Faenza", 1802–05.
1802–05. Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash over black chalk on white laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-3456.
